title: How to Enable the NEW G1000 Pathway Feature in MSFS 2020 | Sim Update 16
description:
Wondering how to turn on the new Garmin G1000 Pathway feature in Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020 after Sim Update 16? This video is for you! We'll show you exactly where to go in the G1000 to enable this cool new navigation aid and how to turn it off when you don't need it and how you can use it during your flight.

Quick, easy, and to the point! üëç
